welcome.title: Welcome to UK Pre-Accounting
welcome.subtitle: Your complete accounting assistant for UK businesses
welcome.description: This app helps Turkish entrepreneurs in the UK manage their finances, stay compliant with HMRC, and make tax time stress-free.
welcome.letsBegin: Let's set up your account in a few simple steps.

businessType.title: What type of business do you have?
businessType.subtitle: This helps us customize your experience

soleTrader.title: Sole Trader
soleTrader.description: You're self-employed and run your business as an individual. You file a Self Assessment tax return.

limitedCompany.title: Limited Company
limitedCompany.description: Your business is registered at Companies House as a private limited company (Ltd).

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: You run a business with one or more partners and share profits.

businessType.notSure: Not sure? You can change this later in settings.

vatStatus.title: Are you VAT registered?
vatStatus.subtitle: VAT registration is required when your taxable turnover exceeds £85,000

registered.title: Yes, I'm VAT registered
registered.description: I have a VAT number and need to file VAT returns

notRegistered.title: No, I'm not VAT registered
notRegistered.description: My turnover is below the threshold or I haven't registered yet

vatNumber.label: VAT Number
vatNumber.validation: Please enter a valid UK VAT number

info.voluntaryRegistration: You can voluntarily register for VAT even if you're below the threshold

taxYear.title: Confirm your tax year dates
taxYear.subtitle: The UK tax year runs from 6 April to 5 April

fiscalYearInfo.title: About the UK Tax Year
fiscalYearInfo.description: The UK tax year is different from the calendar year. It starts on 6 April and ends on 5 April the following year.
fiscalYearInfo.example: For example, the 2025/26 tax year runs from 6 April 2025 to 5 April 2026.

companyYearEnd.title: Company Year End
companyYearEnd.description: If you have a limited company, you can choose a different accounting year end. This doesn't affect your personal tax year.
companyYearEnd.label: Company Year End Date
companyYearEnd.hint: Leave blank to use the standard tax year

companyDetails.title: Tell us about your business
companyDetails.subtitle: This information will appear on your invoices and documents

businessName.label: Business Name
businessName.hint: The name your business trades under

tradingName.label: Trading Name (if different)
tradingName.hint: Leave blank if same as business name

companyNumber.label: Company Registration Number
companyNumber.hint: Your 8-digit Companies House number (Ltd companies only)
companyNumber.validation: Please enter a valid 8-digit company number

postcode.label: Postcode
postcode.validation: Please enter a valid UK postcode

bankAccount.title: Add your bank account
bankAccount.subtitle: Connect your bank account to track transactions
bankAccount.optional: This step is optional - you can add accounts later

accountName.label: Account Name
accountName.hint: A friendly name to identify this account

sortCode.label: Sort Code
sortCode.validation: Please enter a valid sort code (e.g., 12-34-56)

accountNumber.label: Account Number
accountNumber.validation: Please enter a valid 8-digit account number

benefits.title: Why add a bank account?
benefits.accuracy: Improve the accuracy of your records

tour.title: Quick Tour of Your Dashboard
tour.subtitle: Here's what you can do with UK Pre-Accounting

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Your financial overview at a glance. See income, expenses, and key metrics.

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.description: Record and categorize your income and expenses. Keep track of every pound.

invoices.title: Invoices
invoices.description: Create professional invoices, send them to clients, and track payments.

vat.title: VAT Returns
vat.description: Calculate and prepare your VAT returns ready for HMRC submission.

reports.title: Reports
reports.description: Generate profit & loss, balance sheets, and tax summaries.

bank.title: Bank Reconciliation
bank.description: Match your bank transactions with your records for accurate books.

checklist.title: Getting Started Checklist
checklist.subtitle: Complete these tasks to get the most out of your account
checklist.allDone: All done! You're ready to go.

profile.title: Complete your profile
profile.description: Add your business details and logo

firstInvoice.title: Create your first invoice
firstInvoice.description: Send a professional invoice to a client

validation.invalidPostcode: Please enter a valid UK postcode
